6.44: Fixed a rare bug with  Toss.
6.63: Reduced  Toss cooldown from 15 to 10. Reduced  Craggy Exterior armor bonus from 3/4/5/6 to 2/3/4/5.
6.60: Fixed Tiny's illusions appearing small with any  Grow level.  Craggy Exterior Now increases armor by 3/4/5/6. Now triggers off of units with 300 range rather than just based on melee classification.
6.67: Increased  Grow movement speed bonus per level from 5 to 10 (5/10/15 -> 10/20/30).
6.01: Can no longer  Toss units towards ancient creeps and Roshan (Toss can't target them anymore, but they still can be tossed towards other units).
6.68: Reduced  Avalanche cooldown from 20 to 17. Increased  Toss cast range from 500/700/900/1100 to 700/900/1100/1300. Added  Aghanim's Scepter to Tiny: Grants Tiny the War club ability.
6.69: War Club Increased attack count from 3 to 6. Increased cleave radius from 300 to 400.
6.04: Grow Now grants 1 armor on each level (1/2/3). Fixed location in the hud.
6.05: Increased  Avalanche radius from 275 to 325. Fixed few issues caused by leveling  Grow multiple times rapidly (would cause loss of all items in the inventory).
6.06: Reduced  Grow attack speed reduction from 20/40/60 to 20/35/50.
6.07: Fixed various issues with  Grow in Deathmatch mode and some memory leak issues.
6.31: Reduced  Tossed unit extra damage from 50% to 20%. Each level of  Grow now increases that damage by 15% (to 35%/50%/65%). Tossed allied units always take the 20% damage, no matter on what level Grow is.  Grow No longer grants 1 armor per level (1/2/3 -> 0/0/0) Recoded ability to get rid of the following unwanted effects upon leveling: Refreshing of all of Tiny's ability and item cooldowns. disjointing of projectiles. dispeling of buffs and debuffs. Clearing of targetings done towards Tiny, including aggro loss from lane and neutral creeps. Interrupting of Tiny's current orders.
6.03b: Can no longer  Toss Roshan towards other units.
6.72d: Undid melee hero collision change from 6.72c
6.19: Can no longer  Toss a unit towards a courier. Fixed  Grow location in the hud when learning.
6.54: Avalanche Now damages tossed units twice, instead of hitting them indefinite times. No longer affects ancient creeps and Roshan.  Toss No longer uses manacost/cooldown if the cast because of no valid tossable units being nearby. Now seeks its target, instead of landing where the target was upon cast (not disjointable). Now deals magical damage, instead of universal damage. Fixed a minor bug with  Grow.
6.79: Craggy Exterior Increased proc chance from 6%/12%/18%/24% to 10%/15%/20%/25%. Increased Stun duration from 1.2 to 1.2/1.3/1.4/1.5.
6.78: Reduced  Toss cooldown from 10 to 9. Can now  Toss units towards Runes.
6.72c: Melee hero collision size now reduced from 24 to 12.
6.75: Increased  Toss cast range from 700/900/1100/1300 to 1300 on each level.
6.17: Avalanche Increased cooldown from 13 to 15. Reduced cast range from 750 to 700.
6.10: Fixed some memory leak issues with  Craggy Exterior.  Grow now grants 5 movement speed on each level (5/10/15).
6.71: Increased  Grow attack damage bonus from 40/80/120 to 50/100/150.
6.70: Increased  Grow movement speed bonus from 10 to 20 per level (10/20/30 -> 20/40/60).
6.73: Reworked  Aghanim's Scepter upgrade No longer grants the War Club ability. Now increases  Grow Tossed unit bonus damage from 35%/50%/65% to 50%/65%/80%. Now causes  Grow to increase attack range by 107, grant a 50% damage cleave with a 400 radius and causes attacks to deal 75% more damage to structures. Tiny visually equips a tree when having Aghanim's Scepter.
6.72: Tossed allied units no longer take damage. (they used to take the 20% tossed unit damage).
6.58: Fixed  Avalanche damaging  Tossed allied units. Fixed a minor coding bug with  Toss
6.81: Rescaled  Craggy Exterior stun duration from 1.2/1.3/1.4/1.5 to 1/1.25/1.5/1.75.
6.83: Increased  Toss duration from 1 to 1.3. Increased  Grow movement speed bonus from 20/40/60 to 40/50/60.
6.84: Toss Now grabs the closest unit to Tiny, instead of a random unit within the radius. Increased grab radius from 250 to 275.
6.03: Tiny no longer requires wood to revive.
6.14: Avalanche Increased cooldown from 11 to 13. Increased manacost from 95/105/115/125 to 140.
6.27: Fixed Tiny's movement speed not displaying correctly after leveling  Grow.
6.25: Reduced  Avalanche manacost from 140 to 120.  Toss Now does partial damage (33% of area damage) to buildings. Reduced manacost from 135 to 120.
6.22: Avalanche Reduced cast range from 700 to 600. Increased cooldown from 15 to 20.
6.20: Reduced  Avalanche radius from 325 to 275.  Toss Can no longer toss a courier towards other unit and other unit towards own units (own units can still be tossed to other units). Can no longer toss  Dragon Knight during  Elder Dragon Form towards other units. Can no longer toss ancient creeps towards other units. Removed some visuals to improve performance. Fixed  Craggy Exterior stun duration.
